title: [Dead poets society : publicity kit]
creator_credit: Peter Weir, Tony Thomas, Paul Junger Witt and Steven Haft
brief_description: Publicity kit for the production Dead Poet’s Society (1989), including 3 B&W Stills (Large), 1 B&W Still (Small), 2 Press Kit/ Reviews, 3 Promo Flyers. John Seale cinematographer.
